content:
Tim Abbott said:

Neil Pilgrim (neiljp) said:

I might reconsider if there was a hotkey to mark a topic as read, which is that GUI-only button on the banner?
(searched in the hotkey menu for 'read' to no avail)

That's a good thought -- we probably will want to add a "mark as read" keyboard shortcut if we want to make this option something that keyboard heavy users will be excited to use.

Splitting off the keyboard shortcut discussion from #design > unread banners into its own thread.
Seems reasonable, but I think we'd want it to be a multi-key shortcut, to avoid risk of marking things as read accidentally.
And potentially even pop up a confirmation in situations where it feels really risky, like from All messages and/or when a large number of messages would be affected?
I'm not sure what the best shortcut would be. For reference, Shift + U is our shortcut for marking as unread.
Shift + R is currently in use, and Ctrl + R reloads the page, I guess.
The 'large number of messages' threshold solution sounds like one idea raised for mark-unread problems?
